Kate can introduce you to 9 people at Facebook
Full cycle recruitment for technical and non-technical positions.

• Supported recruiting team to facilitate high-volume, full life cycle recruitment process, from posting jobs, to scheduling interviews, candidate travel, and onsite visits.• Acted as liaison between Hiring Managers, Recruiting team, and candidates to offer a seamless interview process on both ends.• Arranged highly complex interview schedules, travel itineraries and correspondence for candidates and hiring managers.• Led recruiting efforts for the hiring of Weebly's first Customer Support class in AZ office.• Launched Weebly's University recruiting program, attending 25+ schools and hiring more than 30 interns.

• Project coordinator for a redesign of a companywide claims management system • Coordinated and managed one on one meetings with team members across all departments in order to identify problems with claims management and define potential solutions• Defined and presented solutions in an outlined presentation of the project to key leader team• Assisted Sales team with various projects such as creating and running Sales reports • Provided personal assistance to Group Sales Director including scheduling appointments, arranging travel and accommodation requirements, and calendar management • Organized purchase orders, expense claims, and invoices

• Circulated and responded to inbound business development leads.• Created partner pitch slide decks to present to potential partners.• Prepared onboard documentation and coordinated with new partners to set-up Zazzle account.• Worked closely with brand partners to design and productize various stores such as: MTV,Nickelodeon, VH1, Cheech and Chong, Little Miss & Mr. Men, TV Land, NBA, and ASP.• Maintained content offering within key partner stores.• Monitored sales and performed weekly earning reports of current Zazzle partners.• Assisted in writing e-mail blasts and blog posts promoting recently launched partner stores.• Collaborated with Creative, Marketing, and Engineering departments to create store fronts and products, ensure stores were launched in a timely manner, with all licensing terms.• Assisted with quarterly partner communication to inform of new product launches, platform updates,and general program opportunities.• Handled and tracked product samples and ensured products were designed according to specifications, quality and cost targets.• Assisted Chief Legal Officer in ensuring contracts were fully executed, logging legal correspondence, and filing confidential documents.

• Team player that worked side by side the recruitment team to successfully manage holiday hiring ofover 500+ temporary employees during a 3-month period.• Coordinated daily interview schedules of 30-40 interviews a day.• Cordially greeted all candidates and worked with the recruitment team and hiring managers to     manage complex interview schedules.• Accurately managed all documentation from interview packets to new hire material.• Conducted orientation presentations and company tours to groups of new employees.• Interacted with over 15 agencies to manage and coordinate all hiring.• Maintained and updated database of employee records and applicant tracking system.• Assisted finance department with payroll, A/P processing, charge backs, royalty payments, and  physical inventory audits.• Filed and maintained highly confidential legal documents.• Provided support for top level executive staff.

Kate is a pleasure to work with - she takes great strides in assuring that people around her are at ease.  Kate takes instruction well, and was always willing to tackle all tasks. She learned her role quickly and was able to dive in and immediately provided positive results.  She is an effective communicator, is extremely organized, can work independently or in a team setting, and had an excellent rapport with partners and Zazzle staff members alike. She would be an asset to any employer - if she is looking to work for you - I recommend that you give her the highest consideration.

August 8, 2012, Joyce was senior to Kate but didn’t manage directly

I had the opportunity to work closely with Joyce for almost three years, and I greatly enjoyed our time together. Joyce is a pleasure to work with; she is friendly, approachable, and highly knowledgeable in her field of work. While assisting Joyce in the business development department, she was always very clear about her needs and expectations.  Joyce has excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. She is very well spoken and effectively communicates her needs to both colleagues and outside partners. Joyce was also incredibly thorough in explaining new concepts and projects when I assisted with her work. I highly appreciated Joyce's vivacious, fun-loving personality, as it brought people together and created a comfortable, enjoyable atmosphere. Joyce is an incredibly hard worker, and does not rest until the job is done. I greatly admired this trait in her, and would highly recommend her as a wonderful asset to any future employer.
